en: As you're drawing up plans to include in the presentation, you realize the projected deadlines might be a bit optimistic.

Setting these goals for yourself, personally, was fine to do at first. No one would be upset if something went awry. But perhaps you should be a bit more cautious in pitching to a third party. Then again, if you're too cautious they might think you aren't serious.
You settle on the optimstic deadlines. You aren't intending to do this work by half measures.
You settle on cautious deadlines. Unexpected problems could always come up, and you'd rather risk no investor now than an unhappy one with unmet expectations who wants to pull out.
